title: Who first invented the money? Who was the person who invented or made it? How much was he paid? - Quora

response.answer_text: We do not know the specific person who invented it. We only know of the group of people. If you’re talking about coins, then the answer would be the earliest known civilization: the Sumerians. If you’re talking about paper money, which came much later than metal coins, then the answer would be the Song Dynasty of China.

Money was invented by “everyone” and they were “everywhere”, so IP didn’t exist. If you mean cryptocurrency, not even sure that can be protected with IP. I suppose we will have to wait for case law to inform us (haven’t checked to see if it exists yet).
